queries.query: CREATE TABLE D_M${localChannelId} ( ID BIGINT NOT NULL, SERVER_ID CHARACTER VARYING(36) NOT NULL, RECEIVED_DATE TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NULL, PROCESSED BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE, ORIGINAL_ID BIGINT, IMPORT_ID BIGINT, IMPORT_CHANNEL_ID CHARACTER VARYING(36), CONSTRAINT D_M${localChannelId}_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(ID) )
CREATE INDEX D_M${localChannelId}_INDEX1 ON D_M${localChannelId}(ID, SERVER_ID)

CREATE TABLE D_MM${localChannelId} ( ID INTEGER NOT NULL, MESSAGE_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, SERVER_ID CHARACTER VARYING(36) NOT NULL, RECEIVED_DATE TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NULL, STATUS CHARACTER(1) NOT NULL, CONNECTOR_NAME CHARACTER VARYING(256), SEND_ATTEMPTS INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, SEND_DATE TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NULL, RESPONSE_DATE TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NULL, ERROR_CODE INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, CHAIN_ID INTEGER NOT NULL, ORDER_ID INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT D_MM${localChannelId}_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(MESSAGE_ID, ID), CONSTRAINT D_MM${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID) REFERENCES D_M${localChannelId}(ID) ON DELETE RESTRICT )
CREATE INDEX D_MM${localChannelId}_INDEX1 ON D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, ID, STATUS)
CREATE INDEX D_MM${localChannelId}_INDEX2 ON D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, SERVER_ID, ID)
CREATE INDEX D_MM${localChannelId}_INDEX3 ON D_MM${localChannelId}(ID, STATUS, SERVER_ID)
CREATE INDEX D_MM${localChannelId}_FKI ON D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID)

CREATE TABLE D_MC${localChannelId} ( METADATA_ID INTEGER NOT NULL, MESSAGE_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CONTENT_TYPE INTEGER NOT NULL, CONTENT CLOB, IS_ENCRYPTED BOOLEAN NOT NULL, DATA_TYPE CHARACTER VARYING(255), CONSTRAINT D_MC${localChannelId}_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID, CONTENT_TYPE), CONSTRAINT D_MC${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID) REFERENCES D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, ID) ON DELETE RESTRICT )
CREATE INDEX D_MC${localChannelId}_FKI ON D_MC${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID)

CREATE TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ( METADATA_ID INTEGER NOT NULL, MESSAGE_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT D_MCM${localChannelId}_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID), CONSTRAINT D_MCM${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID) REFERENCES D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, ID) ON DELETE RESTRICT )

CREATE TABLE D_MA${localChannelId} ( ID CHARACTER VARYING(255) NOT NULL, MESSAGE_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, TYPE CHARACTER VARYING(40), SEGMENT_ID INTEGER NOT NULL, ATTACHMENT_SIZE INTEGER NOT NULL, CONTENT BLOB, CONSTRAINT D_MA${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID) REFERENCES D_M${localChannelId}(ID) ON DELETE RESTRICT )
CREATE INDEX D_MA${localChannelId}_INDEX1 ON D_MA${localChannelId}(ID)
CREATE INDEX D_MA${localChannelId}_FKI ON D_MA${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID)

CREATE TABLE D_MS${localChannelId} ( METADATA_ID INTEGER, SERVER_ID CHARACTER VARYING(36) NOT NULL, RECEIVED BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, RECEIVED_LIFETIME BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, FILTERED BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, FILTERED_LIFETIME BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, SENT BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, SENT_LIFETIME BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, ERROR BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, ERROR_LIFETIME BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 )
CREATE INDEX D_MS${localChannelId}_INDEX1 ON D_MS${localChannelId}(METADATA_ID, SERVER_ID)
INSERT INTO D_MSQ${localChannelId} VALUES (1)

CREATE TABLE D_CHANNELS ( LOCAL_CHANNEL_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CHANNEL_ID CHARACTER VARYING(36) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT D_CHANNELS_PKEY PRIMARY KEY(LOCAL_CHANNEL_ID), CONSTRAINT UNIQUE_CHANNEL_ID UNIQUE (CHANNEL_ID) )
ALTER TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ADD COLUMN ${columnName} CHARACTER VARYING(255)
ALTER TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ADD COLUMN ${columnName} DECIMAL(31, 15)
ALTER TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ADD COLUMN ${columnName} BOOLEAN
ALTER TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ADD COLUMN ${columnName} TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NULL
SELECT * FROM D_MM${localChannelId} WHERE ID = ? AND STATUS = ? AND SERVER_ID = ? ORDER BY MESSAGE_ID OFFSET ${offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT * FROM D_MM${localChannelId} WHERE ID = ? AND STATUS = ? AND SERVER_ID = ? AND MESSAGE_ID >= ? AND MESSAGE_ID <= ? ORDER BY MESSAGE_ID OFFSET ${offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${limit} ROWS ONLY
DROP TABLE D_M${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MM${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MC${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MA${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MS${localChannelId}
DROP TABLE D_MSQ${localChannelId}
DELETE FROM D_CHANNELS WHERE LOCAL_CHANNEL_ID = ${localChannelId}
LOCK TABLE D_MSQ${localChannelId} IN EXCLUSIVE MODE
SELECT ID FROM D_MSQ${localChannelId}
UPDATE D_MSQ${localChannelId} SET ID = ID + 1
ALTER TABLE D_MM${localChannelId} DROP CONSTRAINT D_MM${localChannelId}_FKEY
ALTER TABLE D_MM${localChannelId} ADD CONSTRAINT D_MM${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID) REFERENCES D_M${localChannelId}(ID) ON DELETE RESTRICT
ALTER TABLE D_MA${localChannelId} DROP CONSTRAINT D_MA${localChannelId}_FKEY
ALTER TABLE D_MA${localChannelId} ADD CONSTRAINT D_MA${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID) REFERENCES D_M${localChannelId}(ID) ON DELETE RESTRICT
ALTER TABLE D_MC${localChannelId} DROP CONSTRAINT D_MC${localChannelId}_FKEY
ALTER TABLE D_MC${localChannelId} ADD CONSTRAINT D_MC${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID) REFERENCES D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, ID) ON DELETE RESTRICT
ALTER TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} DROP CONSTRAINT D_MCM${localChannelId}_FKEY
ALTER TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId} ADD CONSTRAINT D_MCM${localChannelId}_FKEY FOREIGN KEY(MESSAGE_ID, METADATA_ID) REFERENCES D_MM${localChannelId}(MESSAGE_ID, ID) ON DELETE RESTRICT
TRUNCATE TABLE D_M${localChannelId}
DELETE FROM D_MM${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM D_MC${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM D_MCM${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM D_MA${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID = ?
TRUNCATE TABLE D_MM${localChannelId}
TRUNCATE TABLE D_MC${localChannelId}
TRUNCATE TABLE D_MCM${localChannelId}
TRUNCATE TABLE D_MA${localChannelId}

SELECT M.* FROM D_M${localChannelId} M JOIN D_MM${localChannelId} MM ON MM.MESSAGE_ID = M.ID AND MM.ID = 0 WHERE M.ID >= ? AND M.PROCESSED = FALSE AND MM.SERVER_ID = ? AND MM.STATUS != 'R' ORDER BY M.ID FETCH FIRST ${limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT DISTINCT MESSAGE_ID FROM D_MM${localChannelId} WHERE MESSAGE_ID >= ? AND ID > 0 AND STATUS = 'P' AND SERVER_ID = ? ORDER BY MESSAGE_ID FETCH FIRST ${limit} ROWS ONLY

UPDATE D_MS${localChannelId} SET RECEIVED = CASE WHEN RECEIVED + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE RECEIVED + ? END, RECEIVED_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN RECEIVED_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE RECEIVED_LIFETIME + ? END, FILTERED = CASE WHEN FILTERED + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE FILTERED + ? END, FILTERED_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN FILTERED_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE FILTERED_LIFETIME + ? END, SENT = CASE WHEN SENT + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SENT + ? END, SENT_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN SENT_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SENT_LIFETIME + ? END, ERROR = CASE WHEN ERROR + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE ERROR + ? END, ERROR_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN ERROR_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE ERROR_LIFETIME + ? END
WHERE METADATA_ID IS NULL AND SERVER_ID = ?

UPDATE D_MS${localChannelId} SET RECEIVED = CASE WHEN RECEIVED + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE RECEIVED + ? END, RECEIVED_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN RECEIVED_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE RECEIVED_LIFETIME + ? END, FILTERED = CASE WHEN FILTERED + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE FILTERED + ? END, FILTERED_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN FILTERED_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE FILTERED_LIFETIME + ? END, SENT = CASE WHEN SENT + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SENT + ? END, SENT_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN SENT_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SENT_LIFETIME + ? END, ERROR = CASE WHEN ERROR + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE ERROR + ? END, ERROR_LIFETIME = CASE WHEN ERROR_LIFETIME + ? < 0 THEN 0 ELSE ERROR_LIFETIME + ? END
WHERE METADATA_ID = ? AND SERVER_ID = ?
